text: is a public park in Kōhoku Ward, Yokohama, Japan. It contains Nissan Stadium, a number of sporting fields and a birdwatching area. Nissan stadium is the largest stadium in Yokohama city and has a capacity of 72,000 spectators. During a typhoon in October 2017 the park was partially flooded. ==References== Category:Yokohama Category:Parks and gardens in Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Tourist attractions in Yokohama
title: Shin-Yokohama Park
